title: Danny Pearson (politician)
text:
Daniel James Pearson (born 15 February 1973) is an Australian politician who is serving as Assistant Treasurer, Minister for Government Services and Minister for Regulatory Reform in the <a href="Andrews%20Ministry">Andrews Ministry</a> from June 2020. 
Pearson has been a <a href="Australian%20Labor%20Party%20%28Victorian%20Branch%29">Labor Party</a> member of the <a href="Victorian%20Legislative%20Assembly">Victorian Legislative Assembly</a> since November 2014, representing the Legislative Assembly seat of <a href="Electoral%20district%20of%20Essendon">Essendon</a>.
